title: Extremely tasty peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) unsalted butter', '225g (8 oz) light soft brown sugar', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 large eggs', '280g (10 oz) smooth peanut butter', '450g (1 lb) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g (5 oz) salted peanuts']
